168 #ifdef ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
169 inline void icSwab16Ptr(void *pVoid)
170 {
171  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
172  icUInt8Number tmp;
173 
174  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = tmp;
175 }
176 
177 inline void icSwab16Array(void *pVoid, int num)
178 {
179  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
180  icUInt8Number tmp;
181 
182  while (num>0) {
183  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = tmp;
184  ptr += 2;
185  num--;
186  }
187 }
188 
189 inline void icSwab32Ptr(void *pVoid)
190 {
191  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
192  icUInt8Number tmp;
193 
194  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = tmp;
195  tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = tmp;
196 }
197 
198 inline void icSwab32Array(void *pVoid, int num)
199 {
200  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
201  icUInt8Number tmp;
202 
203  while (num>0) {
204  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = tmp;
205  tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = tmp;
206  ptr += 4;
207  num--;
208  }
209 
210 }
211 
212 inline void icSwab64Ptr(void *pVoid)
213 {
214  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
215  icUInt8Number tmp;
216 
217  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[7]; ptr[7] = tmp;
218  tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[6]; ptr[6] = tmp;
219  tmp = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = ptr[5]; ptr[5] = tmp;
220  tmp = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = ptr[4]; ptr[4] = tmp;
221 }
222 
223 inline void icSwab64Array(void *pVoid, int num)
224 {
225  icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
226  icUInt8Number tmp;
227 
228  while (num>0) {
229  tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[7]; ptr[7] = tmp;
230  tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[6]; ptr[6] = tmp;
231  tmp = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = ptr[5]; ptr[5] = tmp;
232  tmp = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = ptr[4]; ptr[4] = tmp;
233  ptr += 8;
234  num--;
235  }
236 
237 }
238 #else
239 #define icSwab16Ptr(x)
240 #define icSwab16Array(x, n)
241 #define icSwab32Ptr(x)
242 #define icSwab32Array(x, n)
243 #define icSwab64Ptr(x)
244 #define icSwab64Array(x, n)
245 #endif
246 
247 #define icSwab16(x) icSwab16Ptr(&x)
248 #define icSwab32(x) icSwab32Ptr(&x)
249 #define icSwab64(x) icSwab64Ptr(&x)
250

262 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccInfo {
263 public:
264  //Signature values
265  const icChar *GetVersionName(icUInt32Number val);
266  const icChar *GetDeviceAttrName(icUInt64Number val);
267  const icChar *GetProfileFlagsName(icUInt32Number val);
268 
269  const icChar *GetTagSigName(icTagSignature sig);
270  const icChar *GetTechnologySigName(icTechnologySignature sig);
271  const icChar *GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature sig);
272  const icChar *GetColorSpaceSigName(icColorSpaceSignature sig);
273  const icChar *GetProfileClassSigName(icProfileClassSignature sig);
274  const icChar *GetPlatformSigName(icPlatformSignature sig);
275  const icChar *GetCmmSigName(icCmmSignature sig);
276  const icChar *GetReferenceMediumGamutSigNameName(icReferenceMediumGamutSignature sig);
277  const icChar *GetColorimetricIntentImageStateName(icColorimetricIntentImageStateSignature sig);
278 
279  const icChar *GetSigName(icUInt32Number val);
280 
281  //Other values
282  const icChar *GetMeasurementFlareName(icMeasurementFlare val);
283  const icChar *GetMeasurementGeometryName(icMeasurementGeometry val);
284  const icChar *GetRenderingIntentName(icRenderingIntent val);
285  const icChar *GetSpotShapeName(icSpotShape val);
286  const icChar *GetStandardObserverName(icStandardObserver val);
287  const icChar *GetIlluminantName(icIlluminant val);
288 
289  const icChar *GetUnknownName(icUInt32Number val);
290  const icChar *GetMeasurementUnit(icSignature sig);
291  const icChar *GetProfileID(icProfileID *profileID);
292  const icChar *GetColorantEncoding(icColorantEncoding colorant);
293 
294  bool IsProfileIDCalculated(icProfileID *profileID);
295  icValidateStatus CheckData(std::string &sReport, const icDateTimeNumber &dateTime);
296  icValidateStatus CheckData(std::string &sReport, const icXYZNumber &XYZ);
297 
298  bool IsValidSpace(icColorSpaceSignature sig);
299 
300 protected:
301  icChar m_szStr[128];
302  icChar m_szSigStr[128];
303 };

316 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccUTF16String
317 {
318 public:
319  CIccUTF16String();
320  CIccUTF16String(const icUInt16Number *uzStr);
321  CIccUTF16String(const char *szStr);
322  CIccUTF16String(const CIccUTF16String &str);
323  virtual ~CIccUTF16String();
324 
325  void Clear();
326  bool Empty() const { return m_len==0; }
327  size_t Size() const { return m_len; }
328  void Resize(size_t len);
329 
330  CIccUTF16String& operator=(const CIccUTF16String &wstr);
331  CIccUTF16String& operator=(const char *szStr);
332  CIccUTF16String& operator=(const icUInt16Number *uzStr);
333 
334  bool operator==(const CIccUTF16String &str) const;
335 
336  icUInt16Number operator[](size_t nIndex) const { return m_str[nIndex]; }
337 
338  const icUInt16Number *c_str() const { return m_str; }
339 
340  void FromUtf8(const char *szStr, size_t sizeSrc=0);
341  const char *ToUtf8(std::string &buf) const;
342  void FromWString(const std::wstring &buf);
343  const wchar_t *ToWString(std::wstring &buf) const;
344 
345  static size_t WStrlen(const icUInt16Number *uzStr);
346 
347 protected:
348  static size_t AllocSize(size_t n) { return (((n+64)/64)*64); }
349  size_t m_alloc;
350  size_t m_len;
351  icUInt16Number *m_str;
352 };
